1.title: Read the Bible
1.description: Read the Bible for at least 30 minutes

2.title: Study a Passage
2.description: Spend time studying a passage of the Bible in depth

4.description: Read a book of the Bible in one sitting

5.title: Read a Chapter of the Bible
5.description: Read a chapter of the Bible in one sitting

6.description: Read a Psalm in one sitting

7.title: Read a Proverb
7.description: Read a Proverb in one sitting

8.title: Read a Gospel
8.description: Read a Gospel in one sitting

9.title: Read a New Testament Letter
9.description: Read a New Testament Letter in one sitting

10.title: Morning Devotions
10.description: Spend time in prayer and Bible reading as part of your morning routine

11.title: Intercessory Prayer
11.description: Pray for others and their needs

12.title: Prayer Walk
12.description: Go for a walk and pray as you go

13.title: Fasting
13.description: Fast for a period of time

14.title: Fasting and Prayer
14.description: Fast and pray for a period of time

15.title: Fasting and Scripture
15.description: Fast and spend time in Scripture for a period of time

17.title: Volunteer
17.description: Volunteer at a local charity or church

21.description: Give to a family in need

22.description: Meditate on the Word of God
